summary: Dazzling Sun is a sunglare replacer that mimics the effect of temporal glare experienced when looking towards the sun.
descriptionHtml:
Dazzling Sun is a Skyrim mod that mimics the effect of
temporal glare experienced when looking towards the sun.
It does this by using a high-contrast colour image to add
colour fringes to the sky-glow.
The textures are based on the Realistic Dazzling Sun mod
for Oblivion, re-sized and re-worked to suit the colder
atmosphere of the Skyrim game-world.

N.B.: never stare directly at the sun, unless it's a virtual one!
author: sefmonsta
